As requested by our dear users: "PLANT STORING" is now in the game!
You can now store the plants you don't want anymore to make room for fresh ones!
But don't worry, you can retrieve stored plant at any moment as long as you have room on your shelve

As requested by our dear users: "PLANT STORING" is now in the game!
You can now store the plants you don't want anymore to make room for fresh ones!
But don't worry, you can retrieve stored plant at any moment as long as you have room on your shelve
